title: # 22 – Something’s Burning Uncut – Ari Shaffir & Sean Patton
description:
Something’s Burning Uncut is the uncut audio from my cooking show “Something’s Burning” on YouTube.

On this episode that originally aired on YouTube Jun 10, 2019 Ari Shaffir and Sean Patton stop by to make Sean's Uncle Terry's famous jambalaya. Sean also stopped by to promote his new podcast on ATC '5 Words'!

Full Recipe:

Seafood Jambalaya and Hurricanes

http://bit.ly/BurningJambalaya

This episode is also brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Visit http://www.OmahaSteaks.com and type “BURNING” in the search bar to get free shipping & free bacon for Father’s Day today.

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
